website_summaries.verdict: The JBL J22i earphone pair brings bass fiends the thunderous low-end they craveâ€”at a low price.
pros: Inline three-button remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Not for purists seeking flat response or crisp highs
Can be difficult to get a secure fit

customer_reviews.title: Put cord over your ear for secure fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm pressed to give them 4 stars due to slightly imperfect fit, but otherwise they are really great for the price and deserve 5 stars. HELPFUL TIP: put the cord over your ear Quality is great, the cord is longer than normal and headphones have held up for months of hard use at gym, running etc. with no damage whatsoever Sound is warm and full, the highs are not annoying and the bass isn't overemphasized which allows you to listen to them over extended periods of time. Probably the best sounding pair of in ear headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.author: D'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money- a couple of minor drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound. Note that the "i" models appear to have Apple-specific functions, but the headphones and mic work fine with my Droid phone. As others have noted, the earpieces are somewhat heavy and can fall out. Since I walk, not a big deal. Can also get water around earpieces which makes them slipperier and can mess up the sound. It is a shame that the white models were two and a half times the cost of the black ones, but who cares if I am not color coordinated. Bought based on good reviews in CR. Overall, very good earphones for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in Texas

customer_reviews.title: An excellent and durable product
customer_reviews.text: I love these ear phones. I bought these in 2015 and I have taken care of them and they continue to function today- just as well as the day they arrived. Great sound fidelity and the no tangle design of the cord has never become knotted. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Soup Sandwich

customer_reviews.title: Great JBL Sound. Heavy Duty. A Little Uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love JBL equipment generally, and these headphones sound great as I expect any JBL speaker system to sound. The only reason for not giving it 5 stars is, as somebody else mentioned, they don't sit comfortably in the ear and when I start sweating they frequently pop out. I've used a variety of different size and shape buds but the problem persists. They're great if I'm sitting around or even doing house work, but if I am exercising I can count on having to re-position them frequently. I really appreciate the heavy duty-ness of the wire sheaths though!
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. I'd had a pair before, but my cat had chewed them, and instead of looking for a new pair I wanted to buy the same ones. The sound quality is great, they fit comfortably, they don't tangle, and it comes with a small pouch to store them in when traveling. I have a pair, my fiancé has a pair, and my sister have a pair- we all love them. For the price you're paying, the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Caley Morales

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy and they fall out. The cords are long which I am also not a fan of. The sound quality is wonderful however. Would I recommend these to anyone? Probably not simply because they do fall out and I had put the smallest silicone piece on them . They are just to heavy it about took my earring out between the wire snagging and heaviness I had to rate low.. However sound quality wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice...
customer_reviews.text: This is a top self ear buds which gives bass like expensive headsets I'll recommend these over all ear buds and most head sets...
customer_reviews.author: Fred n. Binion sr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, no tangling, but seem to fall out a lot
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding earphones at a very competitive price. The cord is very long and doesn't tangle, which is awesome. My only complaint is that the cord might be too long and it's a bit heavy so it's easy for them to fall out of my ears. This was a recurring issue for me while using these earphones while working out, so now I only use them around the house, when traveling, and while commuting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chen

customer_reviews.title: The best ear buds I've ever heard.
customer_reviews.text: I love the balance between the highs, midrange, and bass. If you love bass these headphones are for you...the deepest bass I've ever heard from ear buds. For the best experience try all of the different sizes of the included buds to find the size that fits you. I've found that the better the fit, the better the sound.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grant

customer_reviews.title: I was honestly really surprised with how good they sounded
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for casual use to wear around or while relaxing, nothing active. I was honestly really surprised with how good they sounded. But sound wasn't the issue it was fit. Something about it when i put them in just didn't seem right. I felt like the earbud was slowly falling out of my ear like molasses. These are probably some of the worst earbuds for working out period. These headphones are good for none physical activity and lounging around. Bottom line is for this price (only 11 dollars) i would recommend anyone to buy these earbuds solely b/c of the great price.
customer_reviews.author: it is a good app

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but be gentle!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my j22i's for about five months now or so. They're great headphones to be sure! But the T-split in the cable has come loose and I get crackle when they move. This may be my fault for not being gentle though. Sitting down, these are fantastic headphones, but you do need to use the shirt clip for the heavy cable or you'll hear it flapping around. I do enjoy the heavy cord however because it doesn't tangle in my pocket. Overall these are great headphones with somewhat poor durability.
customer_reviews.author: William Moore

customer_reviews.title: Woooow.... perfect true sound!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you whose deliberately saying there is no bass poor treble..., please refer to the manual of how to wear these headphones properly. It is designed for EAR CANAL INSERTION, not like wearing standard headphone. It came with 3 different ear adapters size, so you have to choose the one that fits your ear canal. JBL is history you cannot go wrong with its product.
customer_reviews.author: AnahoPrd

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: They's great in-ear headphones, with the audio quality I have come to expect from JBL. Sadly the only con is they're a little too heavy, so if they're not forced into my ear they end up falling out with the slightest of movements. Another note, one that doesn't effect my review score is if you're getting these for a Windows Phone, the buttons and microphone do not work. However they do function perfectly on the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Carl with a K

customer_reviews.title: Bass heavy but fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew and he loves them. The wires are thick and sturdy and the mic/volume rocker feels solid and has nice feedback. These are definitely bass heavy but they counter it by ramping up the highs. Which is an interesting approach. They are also very loud and with the proper ear piece, you won't hear the outside world. For the price, these are fantastic and I'm considering getting myself a pair. I went 4 stars due to the heavy bass and it not sounding real balanced, rather just, let's make the highs really high, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't have great quality or audio sound but they work well for ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are ok. I use them M-F when i'm at work every day for at least 5 hours a day. They don't have great quality or audio sound but they work well for watching videos or listening to music at work etc. I've had them for almost a year now and they finally broke. The back part detached from the speaker but I just put some scotch tape on it and it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar F. M.

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: these are decent. to me they sound like they reproduce more low frequency than is in the actual signal but i can live with that. they are comfortable after a few hours of use. the built in mic is a nice feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN

customer_reviews.title: I found them to be just fine. Frankly
customer_reviews.text: I feel completely okay about these. They were reviewed highly on consumer reports. I found them to be just fine. Frankly, I received a headset as a gift a couple of years ago that I liked them more, but couldn't remember the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I like the sturdiness of the wiring. Some say it is too heavy and pulls out of your ears when running, but I don't use them running so I don't have that issue. For the gym and general listening, they are great and the sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: KirkM

customer_reviews.title: Must have. Wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: This dealer is very good.Will go the extra mile if you need extra help.Requested extra ear tips.He sent them to me and I had additional ear tips within a week There are not too many dealers that would go to that kind of trouble. My hat's off to this vendor. Would do business again. j...
customer_reviews.author: John C. Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, sturdy wires
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, sturdy wires. I loop the wires over the ears to help hold the buds in place... These look like they'll last longer than prior versions with the thin wires.
customer_reviews.author: Boostm3

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned They beat the ear buds from Bose ...
customer_reviews.text: Ipod ready - price was low - expected a meh set of ear buds - surprise! surprise! Best I've owned They beat the ear buds from Bose - The ipod 32g is my first apple product - why did I wait so long !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C. Thrush

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these JBL assuming such a firm will produce good earphones. The only good thing I can say ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these JBL assuming such a firm will produce good earphones. The only good thing I can say is that the headphones build is sturdy. The volume button does not work with my android phone. The microphone is very bad. People on the other side say that a lot of surrounding noise is heard over the phone. Even in quiet places and while standing at one spot people on the other side can barley hear me. I would not recommend these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: YT

customer_reviews.title: You should totally get these - JBL best!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best In-Ear phones I ever had. Even though I had it for less than a month. I found these spectacular in every "headphone-y" way, took them everywhere I went in this cool small pouch JBL provides. Unfortunately, I lost them. Note to self, don't take cool stuff to parties where you plan to get drunk and lose things out of your pocket. Anyway I look forward to get these again when I can and even more to what JBL comes up with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better sounding and more durable than my beats
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't like these ear buds. The wire is substantial and extra long. Once I played several tracks I was hooked. Great sound for the price. Better sounding and more durable than my beats.
customer_reviews.author: Yougottosellitcheap

customer_reviews.title: mediocre quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: quality was not what I had expected from JBL. They worked but overall was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound! if you used to do Bose or ...
customer_reviews.text: Never want to remove my earphone ever again! excellent sound! if you used to do Bose or Monster This items may not that upscale like those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for working out.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is quality but if you use them for working out or in any other way that may cause the volume/answer controller to get wet or even damp it shorts and glitches. The volume goes all over the place and if you use them with a phone then all kinds of where things happen .
customer_reviews.author: Tuesday Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good bass,great for watching movies on an iPad,not so good for music listening,at least for me
customer_reviews.author: Blonde girl in wedges

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect reception, inconspicuous speakers, the ability to control the volume from the nodule, sturdy wire that is impossible to twist ... besides getting wireless headphones, these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Damn good for the price. My kids love them! (Lots of bass too)
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound, but when I got my first pair there was a connection issue with the left earbud. So I decided to just replace them because I liked them and thought maybe it was just this one pair. Nope. Replacement came in and the connection issue is with the right earbud this time. I'm just going to return them. DON'T BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment to my swagger
customer_reviews.text: "Rock-star style that matches your swagger with sandblasted metal-alloy housing trim and tinted silicone tips" See, they said it first! They don't stay in ears, the microphonics are silly bad, and the wire sticks on clothes and bounces around. It's like a massive rubber band. The little nub that brings the headphones together is also rubber so sliding that up and down the wires is a massive pain. The sound is good, they're just not practical for everyday use and walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Louis Quirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its nice i love it the hadeset sound great thank you JBL ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Majid

customer_reviews.title: Monsters!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best I've ever owned. The bass hits on the right spot and you hear every single beats. Especially if you listen to lossless music tracks. I always use that to test the quality of my earphones. These tiny monsters have no muffles even at the loudest end.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M. Owusu Sekyere

customer_reviews.title: Best pair I have every owned
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds work better then any of the others I have bought. The price was a little high for me but they work as well as they said they would.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I received faulty set. Only one ear worked. The shipper still didn’t reply.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: Best ones we've tried yet (and we've had over a dozen!)
customer_reviews.text: Like the features, earbud fit, and especially the cord that never tangles ! Fixed all the issues we were looking to fix. The only problem is that's too easy to unintentionally turn on by the slightest pressure.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: apple ready only
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a note that said that these headphones are only functional with apple products. Any other products they are just plain ole headphones with extra attachments you'll never use so, if you live on planet Apple then these are for you / Windows8 Android Blackberry/ Fuggitaboudditt.
customer_reviews.author: Kiarra O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Works well. a bit of static at times. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. a bit of static at times. May be the quality of the songs.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowed Effigy

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want to use it as a headset
customer_reviews.text: Voice quality and microphone are good. It's a bit heavy. Don't buy it if you want to listen to music, it has very little bass and there are better options available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. My only very minor complaint is that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. My only very minor complaint is that when the microphone rubs against my face I hear scratching noise when using the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Moskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Bad !!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit in your ears, you have to put them in and in again and again. Very irritating and frustrating i don't understand why they made such kind of model which are not user friendly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jitender Semwal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!!
customer_reviews.text: The comments on this Headphone were made by its owner (not me), saying that there are amazing and easy to use,,
customer_reviews.author: hovama21

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance for a great price
customer_reviews.text: great performance for a great price. quality of sound can't be beat. consumer reports was right. the best around. great headphones
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Baden

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound with plenty of bass. However I had a problem keeping ear buds in when walking. The cables are long and heavy. The "tie clip" helped.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Griga

customer_reviews.title: great ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: what can i say JBL always the best the sound is great pick up a set you will love them
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass. Love these earphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bass. Love these earphones. I bought this to replace iPhone standard earphones. Just make sure that you pick the correct version: for iOS (3 buttons) or regular for other
customer_reviews.author: HAI PHAM

customer_reviews.title: Nice feature
customer_reviews.text: The bottom to turn them off while still in your ear is nice. A little difficult to secure in your ear
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great in ear phone but the volume controls just works on Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe dos Santos de Morais

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Terrible sound quality. Compared to some $20 earbuds. The cheaper earbuds were way better than these. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Teezytx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product (You Can Trust) :)
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty good! Last 2 year I am using it, this is my second..
customer_reviews.author: Rajmohan Ramdoss

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They have good sound but you can't use them for doing pretty anything that requires movement like working out, or in my case snowboarding. They don't stay solid in my ear for longer than 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good but won't stay in ear
customer_reviews.text: Sounds are ok. Compatible with my iPhone. But it's suppose to be sport. Keeps falling out of my ears every 5-10m as I run. Annoying.
customer_reviews.author: James Chau

customer_reviews.title: More than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Only thing i wish is that the controls worked for my S4 and not just iphones but its okay. It did say in the description it was only for iphone and ipods
customer_reviews.author: Omar Morales

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great A beautiful headphones Packaging as well Value for money Bass is good Works great with the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: adisak ponmuang

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: they did not work as planned, sent back to seller in hopes of replacement
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Gavish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: sound good but it is not comfortable in the ears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely good....compatible with xbox controller also and delivers best sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to headphone, beating Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed these headphones and I can say that I'm mighty impressed. The range, including low bass, is phenomenal and they fit me quite well. The microphone is clear, and the controls (volume, play/pause) work much better than most in-ear headphones. My usual headphone is the Sennheiser CX300ii, and this will now likely replace that as my go-to headphone. (I lose headphones every couple of months.)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Spouse likes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for Surface RT to enhance travel use for my spouse. She likes them and feels they will be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Teaster

customer_reviews.title: these have been pretty great! I will need more time with them ...
customer_reviews.text: For an economical wired headset, these have been pretty great! I will need more time with them but the thickness of the cord also seems to be holding up better then normal headsets. Mine have been tending to start to rip and tear apart as they get twisted up and untwisted at the plug or the earphones. The flat wire makes it much easier to keep from getting tangled up and straighten if they do. I also like the sound that comes out of them. However, I am not a true audiophile and I would consider myself far from an expert on stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: sdtechguy

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy. Volume controller is flimsy and rattles. NOT for active people. Sound quality good, not great.. Consumer reports got this one wrong. Expected more from JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Taulli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, came a lot earlier than I expected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth the purchase of the item. Great quality and style also sound. Never go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: good price good bargain
customer_reviews.text: they are very well made, they sound incredible. with good bass. i am not a music junkie, i just listen to my phone when i am walking or stick them in my computer so i don't bother everyone in the room . not a high tremble a nice bass and clear sounding . they look expensive and the cord is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: vargastorres

customer_reviews.title: but yet clear as well good headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful sound, but yet clear as well good headphones!

customer_reviews.title: very good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I think they are really good headphones they have crisp and deep bass and you can hear every part of the song that you are playing

customer_reviews.title: Works on Blackberry Smartphones
customer_reviews.text: I like this for use on my blackberry or my home PC even though the literature on the box states they are primarily for IPHONES. The flat cord does take a bit of getting used to but; the sound is very good. I am interested in trying the next model up the J33.
customer_reviews.author: William Bingham

customer_reviews.title: JBL...Name is enough
customer_reviews.text: It have a good treble. Bass is not powerful but it is there. Recommended for listeners looking for a decent earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Tapan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality in both sound and durability of the headphones. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for great headphones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound great going to order JBL wireless Bluetooth earbuds soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the headphone cord is flat and wide like a phone line cord or one to a router and is gray, as well. Too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Will not buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.text: Looked forward to getting these....but they were defective. One ear piece did not work.....but not worth the effort to try and get my money back or a new set.....very disappointed. Will not buy from this seller again....unless they read this and fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: John J Herrington

customer_reviews.title: They sound great! Just don't leave them in your cubicle.
customer_reviews.text: Someone stole them from my cubicle last night - they worked exceptionally well when I had them.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Head phones did not stay in my ears, and I tried multiple sizes. Also the microphone did not work. Disappointed, but I still use them if I am sitting still and using them just for audio. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: sailed with them across oceans and I can say they are the best. They hold up in extreme conditions and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have washed these, been skiing in the rain with these, sailed with them across oceans and I can say they are the best. They hold up in extreme conditions and all functionality remains! Not to mention they are the best sounding earbuds I have ever used. Great sound for all frequency groups.

customer_reviews.title: A waste of hard earned money
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not equalized. The left ear has a significantly differently volume than the right ear. A waste of hard earned money!

customer_reviews.text: For my purpose, using them when I can't sleep they were not right

customer_reviews.text: For the price it is a great product. Good sound quality and mic works well for phone calls.

product_meta.title: JBL J22i High-Performance In-Ear Headphones with Microphone - White
product_meta.description: Style:3-Button Mic| Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingJBL J22i in-ear headphones take professional audio technology and make it personal. Drawing on expertise learned from building some of the finest loudspeakers in the world, JBL engineers created lightweight, comfortable headphones that deliver signature JBL sound. High-performance drivers generate outstanding frequency response and pure bass that is deep, powerful and accurate. Which lets you hear the truth from your favorite music and artists. Fresh styling makes our J22s as pleasing to the eyes as they are to the ears, and an in-line microphone lets you take calls without taking the headphones off.
feature_bullets: High-performance JBL drivers deliver incredible sound quality
Apple three-button remote with built-in microphone lets you control your iPod or iPhone
Three pairs of silicone sleeves for comfort and fit
Carry pouch protects the headphones when on the go

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars138 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
